feedback: Hostel curfew is too strict.
Not enough common spaces for students.
Counseling sessions really help students.
Classrooms are clean and well-maintained.
Too much syllabus is covered in too little time.
Restroom hygiene is below standard.
Hostel rooms need better maintenance.
Online classes were not engaging enough.
Hard to get approvals for student activities.
Cultural fest was a big success.
The fee payment portal crashes often.
Counseling services aren't well organized.
Not enough academic counseling support.
No platform for voicing student issues.
The sports complex is very well equipped.
